sub_title: Data Science | Business Intelligence & Analytics | Technical Product Management
summary:
My passion is to help people to overcome their challenges. I enjoy learning and working with diverse teams that use data and technology to improve people's lives.

I can find valuable solutions to complex problems and expose insights in simple terms. I’ve done so in different roles (Data Scientist, Data Analyst, Project Manager, and Business Strategy Consultant) and countries (Argentina, the Netherlands, Spain, and the United States). My experience exceeded the scope of those roles and I also wore the hats of Product Manager, Product Owner, and Scrum Master.

This diverse experience made me improve my analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills, allowing me to understand different perspectives and needs to create value for users, clients, and stakeholders.  Wearing many hats and working on several projects simultaneously also taught me how to excel with time management, multi-tasking, planning, prioritizing, and organizing efforts with no supervision. 

I'm currently working remotely (GMT-3) as Senior Data Scientist at Shiftmed. I want to keep on learning about data science and technology by helping mission-driven teams to create digital products that make life easier.

You can see some of my Python code in the profiles listed below, although the vast majority of my programming work is stored in my employers' private repositories.

The majority of Latin Americans remain unbanked and the existing banking customers deserve a better choice. Koban wants to offer users digital financial services that are easy to use, innovative, and accessible to move, transact, save and understand money all in a highly secure digital platform.

I was in charge of Data & Business Intelligence. In this preliminary stage, my main focus was on sourcing data and transforming it into actionable insights for the Product, Growth, Operations, and Finance teams. My responsibilities involved:

- Creating a data warehouse using AWS, Databricks, Spark, SQL and Python.
- Creating product & growth analytics using Segment and Mixpanel. Tracking events, defining user cohorts, and creating metrics and dashboards to understand user behaviour in terms of acquisition, engagement, and retention.
- Turning data into insights to assess our product market fit.
- Supporting the company's strategy and OKRs definition.
- Creating ETL pipelines using Python, SQL, Spark, Notebooks, and Databricks.
- Creating KPIs and Dashboards, using Python, SQL, Notebooks, Databricks, Jira and Looker.
- Automating manual processes using Python scripts, APIs, Airtable, and Zapier. 
- Evaluating alternative data sources for future credit scoring and fraud prevention models.
- Capturing data for future machine learning models.
- Implementing Money Laundering alarms using SQL, Python and Databricks.
- Managing the company's AWS account, optimizing EC2 and S3 usage.
- Conducting ad-hoc market research to discover new fintech opportunities in the region.
- Supporting growth marketing strategy definition and recruiting.
- Conducting design thinking exercises to support user research and product development.", 'title': 'Data & Business Intelligence Lead', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 71623953, 'name': 'Metyis', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQEtG5gG093_0g/company-logo_400_400/0/1611840255891?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=kco13YRMeToAOIwQTDKV8AQNm6E5wMR4m2ckbsylq3A', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/metyis/', 'employees': {'start': 1001, 'end': 5000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2022}}, 'company': 'Metyis', 'description': "- Worked with Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to improve efficiency in the hiring and sales processes. 
- Built user-friendly analytics dashboards (Tableau, PowerBI, Metabase, Looker) for customer success, and business development teams so that they could visualize our insights and make data-driven decisions. 
- Used Python and SQL to source, process and analyse data from Google and our clients' databases. - Developed Machine Learning models to predict point of sales' performance and optimize our clients' commercial efforts. 

Data Sourcing with SQL and APIs, Data Science (Data Processing, Analysis, Modelling and Forecasting)  and Business Analytics with Python, Jupyter, BigQuery, DBeaver, Pandas, Numpy, and Matplotlib; Statistics with Scipy, Seaborn and Statsmodels; Machine Learning with Scikit-learn; Deep Learning with TensorFlow Keras; Data Products with Google Cloud Platform, ML Flow, Flask, Heroku and Streamlit.", 'title': 'Data Scientist', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 166889, 'name': 'WCC', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C560BAQGI9xPYcagUrw/company-logo_400_400/0/1576501900544?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=cbPENAgMlfCKJO8hvVtFdJrXgnw5heMXANMRtO5FxbU', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/wcc/', 'employees': {'start': 51, 'end': 200}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Utrecht Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2021}}, 'company': 'WCC', 'description': "We used Scrum to develop software and design an Artificial Intelligence based platform to help Costa Ricans learn new skills and prepare for the labor market. My responsibilities involved technical data analytics, team leadership, client and stakeholder management, product design and
 product management. I wore the hats of Product Manager, Product Owner, Scrum Master and Data Analyst. Among others, I executed the following tasks:

- Hosting design thinking workshops to design our product.
- Analysing user feedback and incorporate it to our solution proposal.
- Sketching wireframes and present our solution to clients and stakeholders. 
- Hosting daily standup, sprint planning, review and retrospective meetings.
- Managing the development backlog, prioritising our client's needs.
- Guiding and assisting the software engineering team.
- Processing data and improving our database.
- Testing our product, gathering user feedback.
- Managing product roadmap and project plan.
- Assisting the sales team with bids preparation for projects in Spain, México, Colombia and Perú.", 'title': 'Technical Product Manager', 'employment_type': 'Contract'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1248, 'name': 'Unilever', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQF6TJKa56uLAg/company-logo_400_400/0/1663661969458?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=YnBfRWG5HlUuJxKelTb56FoVBIORXOSDJMzROxGDhNw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/unilever/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Rotterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': 7, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Unilever', 'description': 'During my Master studies, I worked for the Data & Analytics Department in Rotterdam headquarters.
